itunes:title: This Is the Old Testament Week 3 with Liz Curtis Higgs
title: This Is the Old Testament Week 3 with Liz Curtis Higgs
description:
Raechel and Amanda are joined by author and speaker Liz Curtis Higgs for Week 3 of This Is the Old Testament. The three enjoy a delightful time in the Word as they continue to thread the redemption story through the Old Testament from the books of 1 & 2 Kings to the book of Job. Tune in as they highlight God’s faithfulness in every account, constantly pointing to His use of imperfect people to carry out His perfect plan.

Read with Us:
This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Old Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.
Shop the title Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com.
Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-old-testament-week-3-with-liz-curtis-higgs
